subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants have signed the free-agent linebacker Danny Clark to a two-year contract. An eight-year veteran out of Illinois, Clark was drafted by Giants Coach Tom Coughlin in 2000 when Coughlin was Jacksonville’s coach. Clark, 30, played four years for Jacksonville and has also played for Oakland, New Orleans and Houston. For the Texans last season he started eight games and had 51 tackles and an interception.
